::Spears::

She pulled a quill from her side and threw it as a spear at Serpentor.



--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, KSLawdogg@c... wrote:
> Serpentor:
> 
> 
> 
> Serpentor yelped, shots hitting his right thigh, sending him 
crashing down on 
> his back.  Taking aim with his plasma rifle, the Predacon fired off 
two 
> plasma bolts from his rifle at Ramulus' left foot.
